You will Marvel at our Miracles!!!Our company offers marketing consulting services to small/medium sized businesses with a specific focus on startups companies and service-oriented companies. We provide comprehensive marketing consulting strategies, graphic design, web design and development, social media campaigns as well SEO integration. These can all be bundled into one comprehensive project, or provided for on a per-project basis. Graphics projects include, but are not limited to: logo creation, business cards, brochures, presentation folders, advert creations, basically, if it can be printed, we can create it!Our experienced Marketing Professionals are adept at creating outstanding radio campaigns, TV advertising production campaigns and any online marketing inventions required to reach and capture your target audience. Whether you are looking at developing or designing a new website, a new facebook page, twitter page, online ad or combination of online presence, we will make sure that you reach your target audience, generate an active lead, sell to your target market, upsell to your target market, provide great service and products to your target market, gain referral business from your new customers and track the return on your marketing investment!Specialties: Marketing Consulting, PR, Marketing Strategy, Advertising, Social Media Campaigns, Graphic Design & Web Development. As a consultant for Levi Catering and acting as thier business director, it was my privilege to work with amazing clients every day planning their upcoming events. It was equally thrilling to be a part of the management team and strategize the growth of the organization while helping the owners retain market share and enhance their company's perception in the marketplace.My immediate goal was to enhance the Levi Brand through expanding their social media outreach, their email marketing campaigns, their marketing efforts into new market segments and helping to develop their marketing efforts in their current market through positive word-of-mouth.

I was privileged to lead this organization to new heights - some highlights  were: 1.	Streamlining internal processes to ensure financial system and all procedures were up-to-date, compliant, effective and efficiently run2.	Re-evaluated staff roles and restructured staff duties and responsibilities to ensure maximum productivity and ensured all staff were working to their strengths3.	Re-aligned budgets to allow for additional marketing expenditure reduced superfluous spending and created some incentive for board and staff to creatively design ways to increase donations4.	Full Website upgrades to reflect current information and to allow online registration as well as portable registration at each event5.	Converted to new cloud-based Donor Management System6.	Increased participation in Screening Events by over 100% 7.	Increased Center’s market penetration by 50% and brand awareness by at least 35%8.	Facebook LIKES almost tripled from 253 to 744, Fundraiser and Educational Event participation increased from 120 participants to 175 participants – 69% increase9.	Brought all creatives in-house to reduce significant expenditure 10.	Added educational events and CME events to calendar11.	Increased Board activity and development, assisted with board recruitment and developed and ran board training12.	Implemented creative fundraising opportunities resulting in 15% of the cost of the screening being subsidized by participants and 50% by the lab13.	Negotiated with Phoenix Children's Hospital and secured an affiliation program14.	Was awarded additional grant and sponsorship funds to the value of $47,60015.	Was approved as a participant of the Life & Legacy Program and exceeded the first-year goal of securing 20 legacy commitments for the organization and secured 22 commitments and was awarded the initial grant of $10,000

At Tesseract, education is all about connecting with students. It was such an honor to be a part of this executive team and to accomplish the following during my time at the school:1.	Present to groups of parents regularly to encourage them to support the communication efforts of the school2.	Achieve all that we did within the budget and exceeded expectations 3.	Create a very well accepted and praised communication strategy using the feedback of both staff and parents. This resulted in a succinct and uniform communication strategy that was both simple for the educators to submit information for and the parents to read and find the information they were looking for. 4.	Increase the number of school tours than any other year in the history of the school.  Summer camp enrollment reached record numbers.5.	Create and teach a High School Business Club which was extremely successful. Club members designed and participated in a ‘pay-it-forward’ campaign. Business Club created a new mission statement and vision statement for the school.6.	Re-established the Marketing Committee. 7.	Implemented new and creative out-of-the box marketing campaigns which resulted in a high level of brand awareness and action8. Maintained website and Facebook posts with regular updates 9. Designed and Developed the very FIRST APP for the school10.	Created FACEBOOK groups per grade to allow another medium for parent interaction 11.	Updated website with information that was previously provided as mailings to parents12.	Brought all creatives in house to reduce expenditure13. Wrote all press releases, established relationships with press14. Negotiated all media buys15. Negotiated and maintained all vendor relationships

The Marketing Manager for RWC Building Products, a regional distributor of building materials,based out of the corporate offices in Phoenix, AZ.heads the marketing department that manages the development, implementation, and coordination of marketing activities for twelve facilities throughout the Southwest. As a seasoned professional, I confidently juggle multiple projects, create systems and processes to manage marketing activities, and define metrics for the executive management team. I bring creativity, solid execution skills, and am willing to roll up my sleeves, and do whatever it takes to execute marketing plans. I am  a self-starter, problem solver, strong writer, technically savvy, and a creative thinker. Skills and Talents:•	Implement marketing strategies to further the growth and expansion of the company into new markets.•	Consistently manage the company brand and those of the manufacturers by creating effective and engaging signage, POP, and other marketing collateral.•	Manage the planning and execution of all company events including customer appreciation events, employee functions, and training seminars. •	Develop marketing programs to support multiple divisions by executing email campaigns, raffles, in-store promotions, events, online presence, or other relevant marketing initiatives. •	Create or revise go to market strategies providing both B2B and B2C action plans driving traffic and additional sales to branch facilities. •	Extensively use design software to create all marketing material – from invitations to store signs to truck wraps and more.•	Manage online presence by updating design and content for company websites and social media sites.•	Articulate company initiatives through effective writing skills. Manage all communication touch points.•	Negotiate contracts with outside vendors or contractors.

summary: As an executive with almost twenty years of experience, I truly believe that marketing is the foundation of every organization.  Whether you are running an organization in a service industry, selling a product or helping save the world, how you market your organization will ultimately have a direct impact on how successful the organization is. Every point of interaction a customer has with any person, media, communication, product or service emanating from any organization, impacts the market perception of the organization as a whole. Perception is reality and as an executive who has had the privilege of leading organizations in the for-profit and non-forprofit worlds, it is my passion and my ultimate mission to ensure that perception and reality are one and the same! As a leader, I believe in working with a team to ensure we all share the company's  vision so together we can ensure each goal is realized. This can only be achieved through inspiration, motivation and working together towards a shared vision. By inspiring my team to share the passion, to understand the big picture and by incentivizing them to take responsibility and ensure they fully understand the strategy, I believe they can become leaders of their own! There is no greater investment than in our human capital. The people we work with are the ones who make things happen and the people we work for are the ones who motivate us to do so! My philosophy is always to work hard- play hard, to constantly find solutions, not problems, and to remember that success should be shared to make the world a better place!
name: Jacqui Breger
title: EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR/VP Of MARKETING - Dedicated to Excellence, Creating a Vision, Marketing, Branding & Strategic Growth!
